headline: Democrats nominate Tim Ryan in Ohios key Senate race, NBC News projects

Rep. Tim Ryan has won the Democratic nomination for the Senate in Ohio, NBC News projects, setting the stage for a November showdown with Trump-endorsed J.D.
A 10-term House member who briefly ran for president in 2020, Ryan fended off two lesser-known primary challengers, Morgan Harper and Traci Johnson.
